title: Introduction
body:
Hello, {{_globals._learnerInfo.firstname}}, and welcome to our team presentation project. We hope you'll enjoy your time!
First, we are going to share our vision with you.
instruction: Click each icon to find out more.

_items.title: Connoisseurs & Explorers
_items.body:
Through previous experience or self taught, we know what we’re doing, be it e-learning courses, stunning visuals or the subtle art or saying “no”, encompassed with stellar stakeholder management.

Yet, every day we are searching for the “unknown knowns”.

_items.title: Akin & Diverse
_items.body:
We’re structurally creative and we’re looking at the big picture through the “small pictures”. We speak to people in their language and hear them in ours. We’re early risers and night owls.

We don’t challenge for the challenge, we challenge for the goal.

_items.title: Agile & Steady mindset
_items.body:
We have the backlog in the back of our minds and we don’t just go with the waterfall flow. We create straight yellow brick roads from client briefs to finished products.

We poker plan but leave poker faces aside.

_items.title: Freethinkers & Believers
_items.body:
We defy numbness and overcome our fears, we embrace our mistakes and take them with a grain of salt. We believe that the 8 hour work day is not just filled with minutes and seconds but with ideas and play.

We are not brain surgeons but we believe in stretching neurons.

title: Meet the team
body: Now that you know what our vision is, it’s time to meet the team!

title: Aura
body:
Senior professional with 12+ years of experience in leading competence development & corporate communication projects in global environments, with a track record of cross-functional and multi-cultural programs.
Skilled in mentoring and enabling people in diverse teams, focused on collaborative development.
Passion to do the right things and do things right.

title: Alexandra
body: I am a young, enthusiastic professional in search of discovering new opportunities for career development. I am constantly improving my skills, learning new techniques and tools for creating the best training there is. My belief is that e-learning is the future of education, and I plan to be ready for it when it takes over.

title: Alin
body: Above anything else, I value myself for the capacity to keep an open mind, be adaptive and continuously seek self-improvement. These are also the values I look for in others, as well as in the working environment I choose to be a part of.

title: Dan
body: Hey! I am Dan, Designer living in Bucharest. Tech savvy and always in love with the beautiful.10 years of experience in the always changing world of IT. Snowboarder, swimmer and sneakers aficionado.

title: Cosmin
body: What’s up, I’m Cosmin. I’m an Instructional Designer currently living in Bucharest, Romania. I am a fan of technology, design, and programming. I’m also highly interested in entrepreneurship and gaming.
